00052 //----------------------------------------------------------
00053 GrPolygonBSPSplit::GrPolygonBSPSplit( const GrPolygonGroup& hullPolygons, const GrPolygonGroup& propPolygons,
00054                                                                           GrPolygonUberUVMapper& mapper, bool calcPVS, bool uberTexture,
00055                                                                           float uberTexelsPerMeter )
00056 : _front( 0 )
00057 , _back( 0 )
00058 , _frontLeaf( 0 )
00059 , _backLeaf( 0 )
00060 , _parent( 0 )
00061 {
00062         B_ASSERT( hullPolygons.GetPolygonCount() > 0 );
00063 
00065         unsigned int prevFPCtrl = 0;
00066 
00067 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00068         errno_t error = __INTERNAL_MATH_IMPL::_controlfp_s( &prevFPCtrl, _PC_64, _MCW_PC );
00069         B_ASSERT( error == 0 );
00070 #elif defined( __MINGW32__ )
00071         prevFPCtrl =  __INTERNAL_MATH_IMPL::_controlfp( 0, 0 );
00072         __INTERNAL_MATH_IMPL::_controlfp( _PC_53, _MCW_PC );    
00073 #else
00074 #error need to implement FPU settings for this platform
00075 #endif
00077         GrPolygonGroup tempHullPolygons( hullPolygons );
00078 
00080         std::vector< MPlane > planes;
00081         tempHullPolygons.GenPlaneList( planes, GR_BSP_PLANE_EPSILON );
00082 
00084         std::vector< MPlane >::iterator firstSplitIter = ChooseSplit( planes, tempHullPolygons );
00085         MPlane firstSplitPlane = *firstSplitIter;
00086 
00088         PrintF( "Building BSP tree...\n" );
00089         PrintF(
00090                 " Number of primary BSP splits: %i\n"
00091                 " Initial split chosen: %i\n",
00092                 ( unsigned int )planes.size(), ( unsigned int )( firstSplitIter - planes.begin() ) );
00093 
00095         planes.erase( firstSplitIter );
00096         Build( tempHullPolygons, planes, firstSplitPlane );
00097 
00099         if ( calcPVS )
00100         {
00101                 PrintF( "Generating portals...\n" );
00102                 BuildPortals();
00103         }
00104 
00106         std::vector< GrPolygonBSPArea* > leaves;
00107         GetLeaves( leaves );
00108 
00110         if ( calcPVS )
00111         {
00112                 PrintF( "Connecting neighbors...\n" );
00113                 ConnectNeighborLeaves( leaves );
00114         }
00115 
00117         CalcBounds();
00118 
00120         if ( calcPVS )
00121         {
00122                 PrintF( "Calculating PVS data...\n" );
00123                 CalcPVS( leaves );
00124         }
00125 
00127         PushPropsToLeaves( propPolygons );
00128 
00130         if ( uberTexture )
00131         {
00132                 PrintF( "Generating BSP ubertexture UVs...\n" );
00133                 GenUberTexData( uberTexelsPerMeter );
00134 
00135                 PrintF( "Placing BSP ubertexture groups...\n" );
00136                 std::vector< GrPolygonUberPatchGroup* > uberPatches;
00137                 GetUberTexData( uberPatches );
00138                 mapper.PlaceGroupsSlow( uberPatches, GrPolygonUberUVMapper::EP_XY, 16.0f );
00139         }
00140 
00142 //      PrintF( "Fixing t-junctions...\n" );
00143 //      FixTJuncs( leaves );
00144 
00146 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00147         error = __INTERNAL_MATH_IMPL::_controlfp_s( &prevFPCtrl, prevFPCtrl, _MCW_PC );
00148         B_ASSERT( error == 0 );
00149 #elif defined( __MINGW32__ )
00150         __INTERNAL_MATH_IMPL::_controlfp( prevFPCtrl, _MCW_PC );        
00151 #else
00152 #error need to implement FPU settings for this platform
00153 #endif
00154 
00155 
00156         PrintF( "Building of BSP tree completed.\n" );
00157 }

00195 void
00196 GrPolygonBSPSplit::GetVisibilityData( const MVec3& viewPos, const std::vector< unsigned int >** pvsIndices )
00197 {
00198         int side = _split.GetSide( viewPos, 0.0f );
00199         if ( side >= 0 )
00200         {
00201                 if ( _front )
00202                         _front->GetVisibilityData( viewPos, pvsIndices );
00203                 else if ( _frontLeaf )
00204                         _frontLeaf->GetVisibilityData( pvsIndices );
00205         }
00206         else
00207         {
00208                 if ( _back )
00209                         _back->GetVisibilityData( viewPos, pvsIndices );
00210                 else if ( _backLeaf )
00211                         _backLeaf->GetVisibilityData( pvsIndices );
00212         }
00213 }

00217 GrPolygonBSPSplit::GetLeaves( std::vector< GrPolygonBSPArea* >& leaves )
00218 {
00219         if ( _front )
00220                 _front->GetLeaves( leaves );
00221         else if ( _frontLeaf )
00222                 leaves.push_back( _frontLeaf );
00223 
00224         if ( _back )
00225                 _back->GetLeaves( leaves );
00226         else if ( _backLeaf )
00227                 leaves.push_back( _backLeaf );

00230 //----------------------------------------------------------
00231 bool
00232 GrPolygonBSPSplit::GetIntersect( MVec3& hitPos, const MRay& ray, float maxDist )
00233 {
00235 //      if ( !ray.Intersect( _aaBox, maxDist ) )
00236 //              return false;
00237 
00239         float dist = _split.Dist( ray.GetStart() );
00240 
00242         if ( dist >= 0 )
00243         {
00245                 if ( _front )
00246                 {
00247                         if ( _front->GetIntersect( hitPos, ray, maxDist ) )
00248                                 return true;
00249                 }
00250                 else if ( _frontLeaf )
00251                 {
00252                         if ( _frontLeaf->GetIntersect( hitPos, ray, maxDist ) )
00253                                 return true;
00254                 }
00255 
00257                 float distAlongRay = dist / -ray.GetDir().Dot( _split.GetNormal() );
00258 
00260                 if ( distAlongRay > 0.0f && distAlongRay < maxDist )
00261                 {
00262                         if ( _back )
00263                         {
00264                                 if ( _back->GetIntersect( hitPos, ray, maxDist ) )
00265                                         return true;
00266                         }
00267                         else if ( _backLeaf )
00268                         {
00269                                 if ( _backLeaf->GetIntersect( hitPos, ray, maxDist ) )
00270                                         return true;
00271                         }
00272                 }
00273         }
00274         else
00275         {
00277                 if ( _back )
00278                 {
00279                         if ( _back->GetIntersect( hitPos, ray, maxDist ) )
00280                                 return true;
00281                 }
00282                 else if ( _backLeaf )
00283                 {
00284                         if ( _backLeaf->GetIntersect( hitPos, ray, maxDist ) )
00285                                 return true;
00286                 }
00287 
00289                 float distAlongRay = dist / -ray.GetDir().Dot( _split.GetNormal() );
00290 
00292                 if ( distAlongRay > 0.0f && distAlongRay < maxDist )
00293                 {
00294                         if ( _front )
00295                         {
00296                                 if ( _front->GetIntersect( hitPos, ray, maxDist ) )
00297                                         return true;
00298                         }
00299                         else if ( _frontLeaf )
00300                         {
00301                                 if ( _frontLeaf->GetIntersect( hitPos, ray, maxDist ) )
00302                                         return true;
00303                         }
00304                 }
00305         }
00306 
00308         return false;
00309 }

00328 //----------------------------------------------------------
00329 void
00330 GrPolygonBSPSplit::Save( UWriter& writer )
00331 {
00332         writer.WriteUInt( 'NPSB' );
00333 
00334         _split.Save( writer );
00335         _aaBox.Save( writer );
00336 
00337         unsigned int flags = 0;
00338         if ( _front )
00339                 flags |= 1;
00340         if ( _back )
00341                 flags |= 2;
00342         if ( _frontLeaf )
00343                 flags |= 4;
00344         if ( _backLeaf )
00345                 flags |= 8;
00346 
00347         writer.WriteUInt( flags );
00348         if ( _front )
00349                 _front->Save( writer );
00350         if ( _back )
00351                 _back->Save( writer );
00352         if ( _frontLeaf )
00353                 _frontLeaf->Save( writer );
00354         if ( _backLeaf )
00355                 _backLeaf->Save( writer );
00356 }

00358 //----------------------------------------------------------
00359 void
00360 GrPolygonBSPSplit::Load( UReader& reader )
00361 {
00362         Clean();
00363 
00364         unsigned int tag = reader.ReadUInt();
00365         B_ASSERT( tag == 'NPSB' );
00366 
00367         _split.Load( reader );
00368         _aaBox.Load( reader );
00369 
00370         unsigned int flags = reader.ReadUInt();
00371         if ( flags & 1 )
00372                 _front = new GrPolygonBSPSplit( reader, this );
00373         if ( flags & 2 )
00374                 _back = new GrPolygonBSPSplit( reader, this );
00375         if ( flags & 4 )
00376                 _frontLeaf = new GrPolygonBSPArea( reader );
00377         if ( flags & 8 )
00378                 _backLeaf = new GrPolygonBSPArea( reader );
00379 }

00386 //----------------------------------------------------------
00387 void
00388 GrPolygonBSPSplit::Build( GrPolygonGroup& polygons, const std::vector< MPlane >& planes, const MPlane& split )
00389 {
00391         _split = split;
00392 
00394         GrPolygonGroup* front = new GrPolygonGroup();
00395         GrPolygonGroup* back = new GrPolygonGroup();
00396         int ret = polygons.Split( *front, *back, _split, GR_BSP_PLANE_EPSILON );
00397         polygons.Clear();
00398 
00400         if ( ret >= 0 )
00401         {
00403                 std::vector< MPlane > localPlanes = planes;
00404                 std::vector< MPlane >::iterator splitIter = ChooseSplit( localPlanes, *front );
00405 
00407                 if ( splitIter == localPlanes.end() )
00408                 {
00409                         _frontLeaf = new GrPolygonBSPArea( *front );
00410                 }
00411                 else
00412                 {
00413                         MPlane nextSplit = *splitIter;
00414                         localPlanes.erase( splitIter );
00415                         _front = new GrPolygonBSPSplit( *front, localPlanes, nextSplit, this );
00416                 }
00417         }
00418         else
00419         {
00421                 _frontLeaf = new GrPolygonBSPArea( GrPolygonGroup() );
00422         }
00423         delete front;
00424 
00425         if ( ret <= 0 )
00426         {
00428                 std::vector< MPlane > localPlanes = planes;
00429                 std::vector< MPlane >::iterator splitIter = ChooseSplit( localPlanes, *back );
00430 
00432                 if ( splitIter == localPlanes.end() )
00433                 {
00434                         _backLeaf = new GrPolygonBSPArea( *back );
00435                 }
00436                 else
00437                 {
00438                         MPlane nextSplit = *splitIter;
00439                         localPlanes.erase( splitIter );
00440                         _back = new GrPolygonBSPSplit( *back, localPlanes, nextSplit, this );
00441                 }
00442         }
00443         else
00444         {
00446                 _backLeaf = new GrPolygonBSPArea( GrPolygonGroup() );
00447         }
00448         delete back;
00449 }
00450 
00451 //----------------------------------------------------------
00452 std::vector< MPlane >::iterator
00453 GrPolygonBSPSplit::ChooseSplit( std::vector< MPlane >& planes, const GrPolygonGroup& polygons ) const
00454 {
00455         std::vector< MPlane >::iterator iter = planes.begin();
00456         const std::vector< MPlane >::iterator end = planes.end();
00457         for ( ; iter != end; ++iter )
00458         {
00460                 const unsigned int polyCount = polygons.GetPolygonCount();
00461                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < polyCount; ++i )
00462                 {
00464                         const GrPolygon& curPolygon = polygons.GetPolygon( i );
00465                         if ( curPolygon.IsCoplanar( *iter, GR_BSP_PLANE_EPSILON ) )
00466                                 return iter;
00467                 }
00468         }
00469 
00472         return planes.end();
00473 }

00475 //----------------------------------------------------------
00476 void
00477 GrPolygonBSPSplit::CalcBounds()
00478 {
00479         bool boundsSet = false;
00480         if ( _front )
00481         {
00482                 _front->CalcBounds();
00483                 _aaBox = _front->_aaBox;
00484                 boundsSet = true;
00485         }
00486         else if ( _frontLeaf && _frontLeaf->GetPolygons().GetPolygonCount() > 0 )
00487         {
00488                 _aaBox = _frontLeaf->GetPolygons().GetAABox();
00489                 boundsSet = true;
00490         }
00491 
00492         if ( _back )
00493         {
00494                 _back->CalcBounds();
00495                 if ( boundsSet )
00496                         _aaBox.AddBoxToVolume( _back->_aaBox );
00497                 else
00498                         _aaBox = _back->_aaBox;
00499         }
00500         else if ( _backLeaf && _backLeaf->GetPolygons().GetPolygonCount() > 0 )
00501         {
00502                 if ( boundsSet )
00503                         _aaBox.AddBoxToVolume( _backLeaf->GetPolygons().GetAABox() );
00504                 else
00505                         _aaBox = _backLeaf->GetPolygons().GetAABox();
00506         }
00507 }

00509 //----------------------------------------------------------
00510 void
00511 GrPolygonBSPSplit::BuildPortals()
00512 {
00514         GrPolygonBSPPortalSet* newPortalSet = new GrPolygonBSPPortalSet( this, GR_BSP_GEOMETRY_SCALE );
00515 
00517         if ( ReducePortal( newPortalSet ) )
00518         {
00520                 if ( _front )
00521                 {
00522                         _front->PushPortalToLeaves( newPortalSet );
00523                 }
00524                 else if ( _frontLeaf )
00525                         _frontLeaf->AddPortal( new GrPolygonBSPPortalSet( *newPortalSet ) );
00526 
00528                 newPortalSet->ReverseWinding();
00529                 if ( _back )
00530                 {
00531                         _back->PushPortalToLeaves( newPortalSet );
00532                 }
00533                 else if ( _backLeaf )
00534                         _backLeaf->AddPortal( new GrPolygonBSPPortalSet( *newPortalSet ) );
00535         }
00536 
00537         delete newPortalSet;
00538 
00540         if ( _front )
00541                 _front->BuildPortals();
00542         if ( _back )
00543                 _back->BuildPortals();
00544 }
00545 
00546 //----------------------------------------------------------
00547 bool
00548 GrPolygonBSPSplit::ReducePortal( GrPolygonBSPPortalSet* portal )
00549 {
00551         GrPolygonBSPSplit* parent = _parent;
00552         GrPolygonBSPSplit* child = this;
00553         while ( parent != 0 )
00554         {
00556                 GrPolygonBSPPortalSet front;
00557                 GrPolygonBSPPortalSet back;
00558                 int ret = portal->Split( front, back, parent->_split, GR_BSP_PLANE_EPSILON );
00559 
00561                 if ( child == parent->_front )
00562                 {
00565                         if ( ret < 0 || front.GetPortalCount() == 0 )
00566                                 return false;
00567                         *portal = front;
00568                 }
00569                 else if ( child == parent->_back )
00570                 {
00573                         if ( ret > 0 || back.GetPortalCount() == 0 )
00574                                 return false;
00575                         *portal = back;
00576                 }
00577                 else
00578                 {
00579                         B_ASSERT( false );
00580                 }
00581 
00583                 child = parent;
00584                 parent = parent->_parent;
00585         }
00586         return true;
00587 }
00588 
00589 //----------------------------------------------------------
00590 void
00591 GrPolygonBSPSplit::PushPortalToLeaves( GrPolygonBSPPortalSet* newPortal )
00592 {
00594         GrPolygonBSPPortalSet* front = new GrPolygonBSPPortalSet();
00595         GrPolygonBSPPortalSet* back = new GrPolygonBSPPortalSet();
00596         int ret = newPortal->Split( *front, *back, _split, GR_BSP_PLANE_EPSILON );
00597         if ( ret >= 0 && front->GetPortalCount() > 0 )
00598         {
00599                 if ( _front )
00600                 {
00601                         _front->PushPortalToLeaves( front );
00602                         delete front;
00603                 }
00604                 else if ( _frontLeaf )
00605                         _frontLeaf->AddPortal( front );
00606         }
00607         if ( ret <= 0 && back->GetPortalCount() > 0 )
00608         {
00609                 if ( _back )
00610                 {
00611                         _back->PushPortalToLeaves( back );
00612                         delete back;
00613                 }
00614                 else if ( _backLeaf )
00615                         _backLeaf->AddPortal( back );
00616         }
00617 }

00619 //----------------------------------------------------------
00620 void
00621 GrPolygonBSPSplit::PushPropsToLeaves( const GrPolygonGroup& propPolygons )
00622 {
00624         GrPolygonGroup front;
00625         GrPolygonGroup back;
00626         int ret = propPolygons.Split( front, back, _split, GR_BSP_PLANE_EPSILON );
00627 
00629         if ( ret >= 0 )
00630         {
00631                 if ( _front )
00632                         _front->PushPropsToLeaves( front );
00633                 else if ( _frontLeaf )
00634                         _frontLeaf->GetPolygons().AddGroup( front );
00635         }
00636 
00638         if ( ret <= 0 )
00639         {
00640                 if ( _back )
00641                         _back->PushPropsToLeaves( back );
00642                 else if ( _backLeaf )
00643                         _backLeaf->GetPolygons().AddGroup( back );
00644         }
00645 }

00649 GrPolygonBSPSplit::GenUberTexData( float texelsPerMeter )
00650 {

00652                 _front->GenUberTexData( texelsPerMeter );
00653         else if ( _frontLeaf )
00654                 _frontLeaf->GenUberTexData( texelsPerMeter );
00655 
00656         if ( _back )
00657                 _back->GenUberTexData( texelsPerMeter );
00658         else if ( _backLeaf )
00659                 _backLeaf->GenUberTexData( texelsPerMeter );
00660 }

00662 //----------------------------------------------------------
00663 void
00664 GrPolygonBSPSplit::GenUniquePlanes( std::vector< MPlane >& planes, const GrPolygonGroup& polygons )
00665 {
00666         planes.clear();
00667         const unsigned int polyCount = polygons.GetPolygonCount();
00668         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < polyCount; ++i )
00669         {
00670                 unsigned int j = 0;
00671                 for ( ; j < planes.size(); ++j )
00672                 {
00673                         MPlane& plane = planes[ j ];
00674                         if ( polygons.GetPolygon( i ).IsCoplanar( plane, GR_BSP_PLANE_EPSILON ) )
00675                                 break;
00676                 }
00677                 if ( j == planes.size() )
00678                         planes.push_back( polygons.GetPolygon( i ).GetPlane() );
00679         }
00680 }

00701 //----------------------------------------------------------
00702 void
00703 GrPolygonBSPSplit::ConnectNeighborLeaves( const std::vector< GrPolygonBSPArea* >& leaves )
00704 {
00706         unsigned int leafCount = ( unsigned int )leaves.size();
00707         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < leafCount; ++i )
00708                 leaves[ i ]->FindNeighbors( this );
00709 }
00710 
00711 //----------------------------------------------------------
00712 void
00713 GrPolygonBSPSplit::CalcPVS( const std::vector< GrPolygonBSPArea* >& leaves )
00714 {
00716         unsigned int time = 0;
00717         unsigned int totalTime = 0;
00718         unsigned int leafCount = ( unsigned int )leaves.size();
00719         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < leafCount; ++i )
00720         {
00721                 time = timeGetTime();
00722                 PrintF( "- Calculating PVS data for leaf %d out of %d... ", i+1, leafCount );
00723                 leaves[ i ]->CalcPVS( leaves );
00724                 time = timeGetTime() - time;
00725                 PrintF( "[done]  Total time: %d\n", time );
00726                 totalTime += time;
00727         }
00728         PrintF( "PVS generation completed.  Total time: %d\n", totalTime );
00729 }

00731 //----------------------------------------------------------
00732 void
00733 GrPolygonBSPSplit::Clean()
00734 {
00735         delete _front;
00736         delete _back;
00737 
00738         _front = 0;
00739         _back = 0;
00740 }
